H0.text: Hundreds of stars are the best description of a galaxy, which is a cluster of stars.

H1.text: Thousands of stars are what a galaxy is best described as, a cluster of stars.

H2.text: Millions of stars are what a galaxy is best described as a cluster of.

H3.text: Billions of stars are what a galaxy is best described as a cluster of.
